definitions.title: vb. Pi.
definitions.body: beautify, glorify;—Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[פֵּאֲרָָח]] (obj. Isr.) Is 55:5, Is 60:9; c. acc. of temple; Impf. 1 s. [[אֲפָאֵר]] Is 60:7; Inf. cstr. [[פָּאֵר]] v:Is 60:13, Ezr 7:27; so [[פָּאֵר עֲנׇוִים בִּישׁוּעָה]] Ps 149:4.

definitions.title: Hithp. 1.
definitions.body: glorify oneself, c. [[עַל]] pers.: = boast, Impf. 3 ms. [[יִתְפָּאֵר]] Ju Jdg 7:2, Is 10:15; as polite address to king, Imv. ms. [[הִתְפָּאֵר]] Ex 8:5 (J), assume the honour over me (to decide) when, etc.

get glory to oneself, be glorified, by means of ([[ב]]), of ´[[י]], [[בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל יִתְפָּאָָר]] Is 44:23, so 1 s. [[אֶתְפָּאָָר]] Is 49:3; of people [by ´[[י]]], Inf. cstr. [[הִתְפָּאֵר]] Is 60:21, Is 61:3.
